entry.title: Sunday night: Periods of snow or rain. Low minus 4.
entry.summary: Cloudy. 60 percent chance of rain showers or flurries early this evening. Periods of snow beginning this evening then changing to 60 percent chance of flurries overnight. Local snowfall amount 2 cm. Wind northeast 20 km/h. Low minus 4. Wind chill minus 9 overnight. Forecast issued 4:00 PM NST Sunday 01 January 2023
